title: A novel sensor-based digital instrument for assessment of quality of fibre extracted from banana pseudostem
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Deb Prasad Ray, Prateek Shrivastava, Rakesh Kumar Ghosh, Manik Bhowmick, D.B. Shakyawar, Ipsita Das, Gunasindhu Sardar, Jayanta Mondal, S.C. Saha, Gautam Roy
